name: Poseidon's retreat
description: A website made for an underwater hotel according to a Figma design brief from another group of students.

name: IT-jobben
description: Website made in React using Arbetsf√∂rmedlingens design system and JobSearch API.

name: To-do app
description: To-do-app created with Vite and Vue as a school project. User can add tasks to app, mark them as done, and delete them. User can filter tasks depending on status, and tasks are saved in localStorage.

name: Beefcake
description: A text-based adventure game about a dog going on a quest to look for his ball. Personal side-project to practise Vue and Figma. Please note that the project is currently still in development and is not finished.

name: SR comedy
description: A project that displays all comedy shows from the SR programme API. Assignment was to take over an existing project, refactor code, and eliminate code smells.

name: Quiz
description: TypeScript quiz with 20 multiple choice-questions about geography with timer, scoring and instant feedback.

name: Donut webshop
description: School project in Javascript to create a webshop selling donuts, including time-sensitive discounts and checkout.

name: Restaurant
description: School project in HTML and CSS to create a webshop for a restaurant according to a brief provided by the client.
